page.title: 12Transport around Balsall (2)
page.content: The station is on the main line between Coventry, Birmingham and London.The station is just outside our block. Then if you want to catch an aeroplane, Birmingham airport (which is now International) is only 15 miles away by car. If you catch the train to Birmingham International Station (at the N.E.C) the year old Mag Lev (which is the first successful one in the world) will take you there. Buses go to a majority of places around Balsall Common but take a long time because they go through all the villages. For the energetic types the lanes through the villages around Balsall Common make lovely walks or bike rides.
